message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent chunk.
That's not fair Alice. How about a more even split this time?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's split it 70/30 this time.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm being more than fair. Take this offer or I'm walking!
I'm still not convinced by your threats, Bob.  Let's meet in the middle, 65/35.
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it.
